AUTORESTAKE_ALERT: Click on the address below to setup the restake amount
VALIDATORS_DESCRIPTION: To change the restaking status for your validators you can switch the toggle again on the previous page
ADDRESS_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: Seems like you don’t have any BSC addresses imported into Citadel.one
ADDRESS_ERROR_TIP: Go to 'Add address' section and import BSC addresses of your choice with private key, seed phrase or hardware wallet
GUIDES_HEADER_1: How do I add BNB address to start using an app?
GUIDES_DESCRIPTION_1: Go to “Add address” tab in the main Citadel.one app
GUIDES_DESCRIPTION_1_2: Then choose the suitable option - import an existing address or create a new one.
GUIDES_DESCRIPTION_3: Tap on the token and select the preferred token from the list.
GUIDES_DESCRIPTION_3_2: Choose the token that you want to get through this swap. The estimated amount will appear.
GUIDES_DESCRIPTION_3_3: Set the amount to swap. You can also use “max” button to swap all of the chosen tokens from your balance.
GUIDES_HEADER_4: How do I check my transactions?
GUIDES_DESCRIPTION_4: Go to transaction tab and check all of your recent transactions including amounts and statuses.
GUIDES_DESCRIPTION_4_2: When you tap on a transaction, you will also be able to check it on the explorer.
GUIDES_DESCRIPTION_5: Slippage Tolerance is the pricing difference between the price at the confirmation time and the actual price of the transaction users are willing to accept when swapping on AMMs.
GUIDES_DESCRIPTION_6: It represents the maximum amount of time before the transaction completion.
ADDRESS_ERROR_TEXT: Seems like you don't have any OSMOSIS addresses imported into
ERROR_DESCRIPTION_1: This error happens when you are trying to swap tokens with insufficient allowance, or when your address has insufficient funds.
ERROR_TIP_1: Check your available balance and make sure it’s sufficient. Also, ensure you’ve given the contract allowance to spend the amount of funds you're attempting to swap with.
ERROR_TIP_2: If the error persists, try again later
ERROR_DESCRIPTION_3: Your input amount is insufficient. It might be the case that prices are updating too fast when and your slippage tolerance is too low
ERROR_TIP_3: Increase your slippage tolerance a bit and try again.
ERROR_TIP_DEFAULT: Make sure you have more tokens in your wallet than you intend to swap, or try to swap a lower amount.
NO_TRANSACTIONS_DESCRIPTION: Your transaction records with status and details will be displayed here
LEDGER_ALERT_DESCRIPTION: Autorestaking with Ledger device is not yet supported for networks from the Cosmos ecosystem. (Until the update of the Cosmos SDK 0.46 it won’t be possible to sign authz message types with the Cosmos App on Ledger)
